description: This file appears to be a configuration and conditional build script used in the Yocto Project for defining machine-specific tuning options and compiler flags related to ARM and Thumb instruction sets. It includes variable assignments, conditionals, and a Python snippet for warnings based on configuration mismatches.

methods.name: bb.utils.contains
methods.description: Checks if a variable contains a given value, possibly with negation.

methods.name: d.getVar
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a build variable within the configuration context.

methods.name: bb.warn
methods.description: Logs a warning message during the build process.
